condition.narrative: Each Project Report shall cover the period of one calendar semester, and shall be furnished to the Association not later than onemonth after the end of the period covered by such report.
For purposes of Section 4.08 (c) of the General Conditions, the report on the execution of the Project and related plan requiredpursuant to that Section shall be furnished to the Association.
No later than (3) three months after the Effective Date, or such later date as may be agreed upon in writing, the Recipient shallhave recruited a procurement specialist
No later than (3) three months after the Effective Date, or such later date as may be agreed upon in writing, the Recipient shallhave recruited an external auditor
No later than (6) six months after the Effective Date, or such later date as may be agreed upon in writing the ProjectCoordinationTeam will have received training on the Project#s fin mgmt system
No later than 18 months after the Effective Date, or such later date as may be agreed upon in writing, the Recipient and theAssociation shall carry out a MTR of the project
No later than completion of the Project, Recipient shall have completed and financed: (i) completion of a road safety educationbase; and (ii) acquisition and installation of road signs equipment
The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements audited over the period of one fiscal year and be furnished to the Associationnot later than six months after the end of such period.
The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association not later than 45 days after the end of each calendar quarter, interimunaudited financial reports.
